body_html: Thank you very much for your review @klappradla! Helped me a lot. I've made some cleanups. Turns out I needed the cleanup before_save callback to remove empty strings, but the rest worked out, hopefully
body_text: Thank you very much for your review @klappradla! Helped me a lot. I've made some cleanups. Turns out I needed the cleanup before_save callback to remove empty strings, but the rest worked out, hopefully
body: Thank you very much for your review @klappradla! Helped me a lot. I've made some cleanups. Turns out I needed the cleanup `before_save` callback to remove empty strings, but the rest worked out, hopefully
